raw_comment: I noticed there is not a drastic change until 99.9 and there is a small drop under average for people who would be considered middle class. I wonder if the number of family members who attended before the students in the legacy portion of the study affected their admission. I am also to see if there is any change now that colleges have more of a desire to diversify their student body. I live in a college town. The college near me has a large number of legacy students ,and is fairly hard to get into, so this topic really interests me.
ace_sentences: I noticed that there is no drastic change until 99.9.
I noticed that there is a small drop under average for middle-class people.
I wonder if the number of family members who attended the college before the student affected the admission of the student in the legacy group.
I want to see if there is any change now.
Many colleges desire to diversify their student body.
I live in a college town.
The college has many legacy students.
It is hard to get into the college.
